title: Ticket #3147: RHAP 5.8 clipped as of 7.8.1; shouldn't be
description:
condor_compile is missing from condor-7.8.1-x86_rhap_5.8-*stripped.tar.gz packages. It was present in the condor-7.8.0-x86_rhap_5-*stripped.tar.gz packages. The file is present in the x86_64 builds as expected in both 7.8.1 and 7.8.0.

Observed: the platform named changed from x86_rhap_5 to x86_rhap_5.8

Hypothesis: Changing the platform name caused it to revert back to a clipped port. Some layer (the build glue) needs to updated to now about the new name. 

% cd /p/condor/public/binaries/v7.8
% tar tvzf 7.8.1/condor-7.8.1-x86_64_rhap_5.7-stripped.tar.gz condor_compile
-rwxr-xr-x 0/0           13758 2012-06-08 17:07:34 condor-7.8.1-x86_64_rhap_5.7-stripped/bin/condor_compile
% tar tvzf 7.8.1/condor-7.8.1-x86_rhap_5.8-stripped.tar.gz condor_compile
tar: condor_compile: Not found in archive
tar: Error exit delayed from previous errors
% tar tvzf 7.8.0/condor-7.8.0-x86_rhap_5-stripped.tar.gz condor_compile
-rwxr-xr-x 0/0           13758 2012-05-08 23:49:08 condor-7.8.0-x86_rhap_5-stripped/bin/condor_compile
% tar tvzf 7.8.0/condor-7.8.0-x86_64_rhap_5.7-stripped.tar.gz condor_compile
-rwxr-xr-x 0/0           13758 2012-05-08 15:11:36 condor-7.8.0-x86_64_rhap_5.7-stripped/bin/condor_compile
% tar tvzf 7.8.1/condor-7.8.1-x86_64_rhap_5.7-unstripped.tar.gz condor_compile
-rwxr-xr-x 0/0           13758 2012-06-08 17:07:34 condor-7.8.1-x86_64_rhap_5.7-unstripped/bin/condor_compile
% tar tvzf 7.8.1/condor-7.8.1-x86_rhap_5.8-unstripped.tar.gz condor_compile
tar: condor_compile: Not found in archive
tar: Error exit delayed from previous errors
% tar tvzf 7.8.0/condor-7.8.0-x86_rhap_5-unstripped.tar.gz condor_compile
-rwxr-xr-x 0/0           13758 2012-05-08 23:49:08 condor-7.8.0-x86_rhap_5-unstripped/bin/condor_compile
% tar tvzf 7.8.0/condor-7.8.0-x86_64_rhap_5.7-unstripped.tar.gz condor_compile
-rwxr-xr-x 0/0           13758 2012-05-08 15:11:36 condor-7.8.0-x86_64_rhap_5.7-unstripped/bin/condor_compile

libcondorsyscall.a and libcondorzsyscall.a appear to be missing as well, supporting the theory that this is an unintentional clipped build.
remarks:
2012-Jul-19 14:25:32 by adesmet:
Fixed in [32858] by kronenfe
check_ins: 2012-Jul-19 12:24   Check-in [32858]: Added definitions for future versions of RHEL and SL platforms. This is to prevent platforms from switching from full ports to clipped ports when the NMI_PLATFORM string changes. Eventually we hope that NMI will call things x86_rhap_5 instead of including the minor release number (e.g. x86_64_rhap_5.7) [...] (By Scot Kronenfeld )
creator: adesmet
